name: DarkWeb BBC News
description:
* UPDATED FEBRUARY 2017 *

This style updates the BBC News site to a dark theme. It applies to the BBC News page only, as the homepage has some conflicts. This should work with both the UK and international versions.

Please leave a question, comment or thumbs up if you find this skin useful. Feel free to call out bugs (there are still a few) and include feature requests, and I will try to address them in a timely manner.

https://forum.userstyles.org/post/discussion?Discussion/StyleID=123382
